ComicInfo.Summary:
Superstar creator Rob Liefeld’s action epic hits a new high! Snake Eyes races against time... and each other. There can be only one winner, but no limit on those who fall to—the Deadgame!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Rob Liefeld (a), Adelso Corona (i) & Federico Blee (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Rob Liefeld (a), Adelso Corona (i) & Omi Remalante (c) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Rob Liefeld (a), Adelso Corona (i) & Federico Blee (c) | 3 | RE | New York Comic Con 2020 Exclusive Classic Toy Art Variant Cover | Unlisted | 4 | RE | Big Time Collectibles Exclusive Variant Cover A (Homage, Virgin) | Mico Suayan (a), Alan Quah (c) & Komikaki Studio (c) | 5 | RE | Big Time Collectibles Exclusive Variant Cover B (Virgin) | Mico Suayan (a), Alan Quah (c) & Komikaki Studio (c) | 6 | RE | East Side Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Virgin) | John Giang | 7 | RE | East Side Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Virgin) | John Giang | 8 | RE | East Side Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Virgin) | Kirill Repin | 9 | RE | Frankie's Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Virgin) | Tyler Kirkham | 10 | RE | Frankie's Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Black & White Virgin) | Tyler Kirkham | 11 | RE | Unknown Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Virgin) | Kael Ngu | 12 | RE | Unknown Comics Exclusive Variant Cover (Virgin) | Kael Ngu | 13 | RE | Rob Liefeld Creations Exclusive Variant Cover | Rob Liefeld (a) & Jay David Ramos (c) | 14 | RE | Rob Liefeld Creations Exclusive Variant Cover | Rob Liefeld (a) & Federico Blee (c) | 15 | RE | Rob Liefeld Creations Exclusive Variant Cover | Rob Liefeld (a) & Federico Blee (c) | 16 | *Notes:* The Frankie's Comics Exclusive Variant Covers are a homage of Prince's album and movie poster for Purple Rain.
